numlitem.para: Center tank is verified to be empty before each refueling, and

note.para: Aircraft has Automatic Shut OFF system installed – (Restriction placard removed).
BOTH pumps are INOP for this sequence.

placard.para: Placard BOTH Center Fuel Pump Switches "PUMP INOP – C/B PULLED ON P6" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

note.para: The repetitive inspection required when this item is inoperative must be documented in the Aircraft Logbook at the prescribed intervals. (Refer to GMM, Chapter 3, Section 6.)

numlitem.para: To determine Center Tank Fuel quantity, observe the fuel quantity on the Fuel Quantity Indicator (P5) or the Fueling Control Panel (P28).

note.para: Suction Defuel of Center Tank is not permitted.

numlitem.para: Open and collar both Center Tank OVRD pump C/B's on P6:
